title: Family Story Time
intro: I created this application to help children in their reading journey, but also to be able to have stories read to them by loved ones who cannot be there.

paragraph_1.title: Enjoy Reading
paragraph_1.content_2: Keep all of your favorite books in one place for easy access at home or on the go.

paragraph_2.title: Keep Your Favorites
paragraph_2.content_1: Digitize your favorite books so that they'll last for years to come.

paragraph_3.title: Practice Reading
paragraph_3.content_1: The books can auto read while you read along.

paragraph_4.title: Familiar Voices
paragraph_4.content_1: Have your stories read to you by your favorite storyteller, even if they can't be there.

paragraph_5.title: Share
paragraph_5.content_1: Create your own stories and share them with friends and family.
paragraph_5.content_2: Stories can be exported either individually or all at once.

paragraph_6.title: Parental Lock
paragraph_6.content_1: The application has a parental lock feature.
paragraph_6.content_2: When enabled, the device owner must unlock the application using their biometric data (dependant on the device) to access the sensitive aspects of the application.
